import React from 'react'; import { MDBIcon,MDBCol,MDBInput,MDBCard, MDBCardBody} from "mdbreact"; import Getatelier from './getatelier' class Atelier extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { titre: '', description:'', date: '', horaire: '', duree: '', place_dispo: '', place_reserver: '', photo_produit:'', prix: '', }; this.onChange = this.onChange.bind(this) this.handleUploadImage = this.handleUploadImage.bind(this); } onChange(event) { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } handleUploadImage(ev) { ev.preventDefault(); const data = new FormData(); data.append('photo_produit', this.uploadInput.files[0]); data.append('titre',this.state.titre); data.append('description',this.state.description); data.append('date',this.state.date); data.append('horaire',this.state.horaire); data.append('duree',this.state.duree); data.append('place_dispo',this.state.place_dispo); data.append('place_reserver',this.state.place_reserver); data.append('prix',this.state.prix); fetch('http://localhost:8080/atelier', { method: 'POST', body: data, }).then((response) => { response.json().then((body) => { this.setState({ photo_produit: `http://localhost:8080/atelier/${body.photo_produit}` }); console.log('ity ilay body.fil',body.photo_produit); }); }); } render() { return (

{ this.uploadInput = ref; }} type="file" name="photo_produit"/>
); } } export default Atelier;
